definition: pork chop/pork cutlet/spare ribs/(coll.) skinny person
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: Sugar and vinegar are seasonings of this sparerib soup.
sentences.chinese: 糖和醋是做這道排骨湯的輔料。
排骨汆水後以冷水洗淨備用。

sentences.english: Wash pork spare-rib. Blanch the spare-rib in boiling water, remove.
sentences.chinese: 小排骨洗淨，放入滾水中燙過，取出備用。

sentences.english: Served with Chinese daily soup, seasonal vegetable, fruit and green tea.
sentences.chinese: 本幫糖醋排骨飯配以中式老火湯，時蔬，水果及綠茶。

sentences.english: Would you like to go to the China Hotel for dinner ? They serve excellent sour and sweet pork steak .
sentences.chinese: 你想到中國飯店喫晚餐嗎？他們的糖醋排骨棒極了。

sentences.english: Then it should boil for some time, and then put ribs in there and let them boil together with pea.
sentences.chinese: 煮一段時間之後就把排骨放進去和豌豆一起煮。
這道牛肉排骨真是太特別了。

sentences.english: This worker ant chops the leaf into smaller pieces that are about a millimeter in length.
sentences.chinese: 這個工人螞蟻排骨葉成小木塊這一毫米的長度。

sentences.english: Drink rib soup, braised pork rice and goose the volume is the best match.
sentences.chinese: 喝排骨湯，滷肉飯和鵝卷是最佳匹配。

sentences.english: Rinse and drain the ribs, add in all the seasoning ingredients and marinate it for at least an hour.
sentences.chinese: 排骨洗淨後放乾，再加入醃料醃一小時或以上。

sentences.english: Let's order sweet and sour pork.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們點一份糖醋排骨。

sentences.english: Theyare sweet and sour pork, almond junket, shrimp omelet and Chickeninsweet and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉點了糖醋排骨，杏仁豆腐，蝦仁煎蛋和糖醋雞塊。
今天的特色菜是什麼？燉排骨。

sentences.english: Rinse the pork spareribs and cut into 5cm pieces.
sentences.chinese: 排骨洗淨後，切成5釐米左右小段。

sentences.english: Yiguan suggests that they join hands to produce and market vacuum-packed pork ribs soup.
sentences.chinese: 一官提議與月霞合夥做排骨湯真空裝。

definition: (of food etc) soft/pulpy/(Tw) (of a person) lacking drive/shiftless/lazy
